Package doodlepad

Interface PadKeyListener


  • public interface PadKeyListener
    The interface to be implemented when handling PadKeyListener events.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mark F. Russo, Ph.D.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onKeyPressed​(java.lang.String keyText, java.lang.String keyModifiers)
      The onKeyPressed method is invoked by PadKeyListeners
      void onKeyReleased​(java.lang.String keyText, java.lang.String keyModifiers)
      The onKeyReleased method is invoked by PadKeyListeners
      void onKeyTyped​(char keyChar)
      The onKeyTyped method is invoked by PadKeyListeners

    • Method Detail

      • onKeyTyped

        void onKeyTyped​(char keyChar)
        The onKeyTyped method is invoked by PadKeyListeners
        Parameters:
        keyChar - The char typed.

      • onKeyPressed

        void onKeyPressed​(java.lang.String keyText,
                  java.lang.String keyModifiers)
        The onKeyPressed method is invoked by PadKeyListeners
        Parameters:
        keyText - A String describing the keyCode, such as "HOME", "F1" or "A".
        keyModifiers - A String describing the modifier key(s), such as "Shift", or "Ctrl+Shift".

      • onKeyReleased

        void onKeyReleased​(java.lang.String keyText,
                   java.lang.String keyModifiers)
        The onKeyReleased method is invoked by PadKeyListeners
        Parameters:
        keyText - A String describing the keyCode, such as "HOME", "F1" or "A".
        keyModifiers - A String describing the modifier key(s), such as "Shift", or "Ctrl+Shift".
